product_name: Wilderness Press San Bernardino Mountains Recreation Map - Sixth Edition
long_description: Printed on waterproof paper, this map is your guide to exploring the San Bernardino Mountains. Recreation map shows roads, trails, ranger stations, wilderness campsites, fire lookouts, springs, streams, rivers, lakes and campground locations. Coverage includes the San Bernardino National Forest, San Gorgonio Wilderness, San Jacinto Wilderness & State Park. Fully indexed map locations with separate hike and campsite indexes; companion map to the book. Folded size: 7 x 4.5 inches; unfolded size: 21 x 29.5 inches. Wilderness Press; 6th edition, copyright 2006.
short_description: Printed on waterproof paper, this map is your guide to exploring the San Bernardino Mountains.
